edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend
Class LSPDocSorter

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--edu.columbia.cs.sdarts.backend.LSPDocSorter
public class LSPDocSorter
extends java.lang.Object

A convenient utility class for sorting LSPDocs using an array of LSPSortByFields. This should be used inside a QueryProcessor implementation, for sorting results before returning them.

Method Detail

sortLSPDocs

public static void sortLSPDocs(java.util.List docs,
                               LSPSortByField[] sortByFields)
Sort a collection of LSPDocs. Note that this changes the ordering of the original collection; it does not copy and return a sorted collection.
Parameters:
docs - a List containing LSPDocs to be sorted
sortByFields - the sorting fields to use, in order of precedence

sortLSPDocs

public static void sortLSPDocs(LSPDoc[] docs,
                               LSPSortByField[] sortByFields)
Sort a collection of LSPDocs. Note that this changes the ordering of the original collection; it does not copy and return a sorted collection.
Parameters:
docs - an array containing LSPDocs to be sorted
sortByFields - the sorting fields to use, in order of precedence
